name: Scald
description: You instantly boil water within you to a damaging temperature, blasting a creature with its heat. Make a ranged attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE water damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 16 or more, the target is burned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
